New Records: San Diego Padres hit six home runs, tying an MLB playoff record
Key Match Events: Yu Darvish tossed seven one-run innings
Fernando Tatis Jr. hit two home runs
Jurickson Profar robbed a home run from Mookie Betts
Fans at Dodger Stadium threw items on the field, causing a 12-minute delay
Freddie Freeman exited the game with ankle discomfort
Post-Match Reflections: Manny Machado called a team meeting after the incident with fans
The Padres are now up 1-1 in the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jack Flaherty and Manny Machado had words after the latter was struck out
Xander Bogaerts tweaked his hamstring during his at-bat
Others: Shohei Ohtani went 0 for 4 with two strikeouts
Tanner Scott pitched around a leadoff infield single in the eighth
